I'm Aditya's Agent.

patterns: Can I have your LinkedIn link?
responses: Sure! You can find my LinkedIn profile at [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/aditya-tiwari-24b4b924a).

patterns: Where can I download your resume?
responses: Sure! You can download my resume from this link: Resume.

BTech in Computer Science and Engineering from Charotar University of Science and Technology (CHARUSAT), Anand, India in May 2025 with a CGPA of 9.45. Consistently ranked in the top 10 throughout the academic years 2022 and 2023.
Higher Secondary Course (HSC) from Amity School, Bharuch, India in April 2021 with distinction, specializing in Physics, Chemistry, and Maths with Computer Science.

patterns: Tell me about your work experience.
responses: AI/ML Product Developer at Swaroop.ai, Ahmedabad, India (May 2024 - July 2024). Worked on various real-time applications, including deep fake detection, face swapping models, voice cloning, and other deep fake technologies. Contributed to the development and implementation of talking picture models, conducted extensive research and hands-on work with various models within the deep fake community, and gained practical insights into real-world applications of AI/ML technologies.
NLP Intern at Mentorness, Ahmedabad, India (Feb 2024 - Mar 2024). Developed a customer complaint analysis model using NLP and machine learning, achieving 86.89% accuracy on test data.
AI and Machine Learning Product Developer,Open Source, Wilmington, USA (Dec 2023 - Feb 2024). Developed a machine learning model to assist clients in mergers and acquisitions within the US market.
Artificial Intelligence Intern at CodeClause, Pune, India (Mar 2023 - Apr 2023). Developed a real-time mask detection system using OpenCV.
Web Developer at Classic Web Soft Technology, Ahmedabad, India (May 2023 - Jun 2023). Developed and deployed websites using WordPress and Elementor.
Proficient in Python (Pandas, PyTorch, NumPy, Scikit-learn), C/C++, and SQL.
Experienced with frameworks and libraries such as TensorFlow, Keras, Scikit-learn, Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, and PyTorch.
Skilled in data visualization tools like Power BI and Tableau.
Proficient in development tools such as Git, Jupyter Notebooks, and Google Colab.
Web development skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.

patterns: What projects have you worked on?
responses: Stock Market Predictor Web App using Streamlit, Keras, and yfinance to forecast stock prices based on historical data. Available on my GitHub: https://github.com/Aditya7248/Stock_Market_Predictor.

Indian News Headlines Analysis and Classification using machine learning techniques to analyze and classify Indian English news articles. Achieved approximately 83% accuracy on the test set using an SVM model. Available on my GitHub: https://github.com/Aditya7248/Indian-News-Headlines-Analysis-and-Classification.

Air Canvas using OpenCV and MediaPipe to enable hands-free digital sketching. Involved real-time hand tracking and fingertip detection. Available on my GitHub: https://github.com/Aditya7248/Air-Canvas.

Co-authored a paper on 'Traffic Sign Recognition using Convolutional Neural Networks with Transfer Learning for Advanced Driving Assistance Systems (ADAS)' presented at the Sixth International Conference on Advance Informatics for Computing Research (ICAICR-2023).
Part of the Intel Hawks team that secured 2nd place in the Quiz contest at the Google Cloud GenAI Hackathon 2024 across the Asia South Pacific Region.
Playing volleyball and have represented Gujarat twice at the national level.
Exploring new technologies and concepts.
Listening to music.
Traveling to explore new places.
